reviewText:
Early Access Review

Quite interestingly promising game. At first glance simple, but terribly addictive. Climate graphics and music. It has many bugs but still has a huge potential.
Pros:
- Enjoyable gameplay
- Beautiful graphics
- Climatic music
cons:
- Lack of plot
- Could be more levels

As early access 7.5 / 10
voteText: 7 of 11 people (64%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Awakening of Solutio as unknown for me group of creators could suprise me nicely with its pleasant game, refined scenery and interesting ideas.

Advantages:
-Nice graphics (boards and charakter)
-Addictive game
-Interesting solutions
-Introduce the mood from first board
-Unusual idea and solutions in game
-Good price

Disadvantages:
-Small amount of boards

I reccomend it to every person who looks for nice variant. It really can make you relax
voteText: 4 of 8 people (50%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Early Access Review

As an early access pretty cool game. It has its drawbacks, it could be improved by about fighting the enemy or something. but makes up for graphics and general climate created. Besides it is a great relief from the AAA games.
If it comes to me, I recommend! Game worth its ;) wink 8/10

reviewText:
I thought this game looked cool based on the pictures and the low price. however, after buying it i was very wrong. the graphics are ok but the gameplay is worse than an early alpha game. the hitboxes are terrible and the screen is very zoomed for this kind of game.

when i first downloaded the game i swear it said early access, however that is gone now.
